title: Sıfır Bir
resume: The inside story of one of the most dangerous clans of Adana; a major city in southern Turkey. This dangerous gang tries to secure the justice in their district, notably by blocking drug use, prostitution and establishing the order. Also portrays the street culture of Turkish ghettos through rap music and street art from the 90’s to nowadays.
